WorkItem.Description:
In v4, Beta 1, Messenger.Default.Register(BaseClass, ....) does not receive messages sent by Messenger.Default.Send(SubClass).

For example, we use Messenger to re-route exceptions to a central place in the ViewModel which can display them gracefully and Messenger.Default.Register(Exception, ....) used to receive ApplicationExceptions, FormatExceptions, etc.
WorkItem.Summary: v4, Beta 1 Messenger subclass vs. class
